commands.name: config
commands.description: Command for managing and adjusting various settings and preferences for the server.

commands.name: config welcome
commands.description: Configure awesome welcome messages in your server.

commands.name: config welcome enable
commands.description: Enable the welcome plugin for this server.

commands.name: config welcome disable
commands.description: Disable the welcome plugin for this server.

commands.name: config welcome toggle
commands.description: Toggles Enable/Disable the welcome modes.

commands.name: config welcome set_message
commands.description: Set the welcome message.

commands.name: config welcome test
commands.description: Test the welcome message.

commands.name: config leave
commands.description: Configure awesome leave messages in your server.

commands.name: config leave enable
commands.description: Enable the leave message plugin for this server.

commands.name: config leave disable
commands.description: Disable the leave message plugin for this server.

commands.name: config leave toggle
commands.description: Toggles Enable/Disable the leave message modes.

commands.name: config leave set_message
commands.description: Set the leave message.

commands.name: config leave test
commands.description: Test the leave message.

commands.name: config autorole
commands.description: Configure unlimited autoroles in your server.

commands.name: config autorole add
commands.description: Add a role to (humans/bots) autorole list.

commands.name: config autorole remove
commands.description: Remove a role from (humans/bots) autorole list.

commands.name: config mod_response
commands.description: Customize moderation response messages.

commands.name: giveaway
commands.description: Configure awesome giveaways in your server.

commands.name: giveaway start
commands.description: Starts a new giveaway.

commands.name: giveaway reroll
commands.description: Picks a new winner from the specified giveaway.

commands.name: giveaway end
commands.description: Ends a running giveaway.

commands.name: giveaway show
commands.description: Shows a list of running giveaways.

commands.name: rolemenu role
commands.description: Add/Remove a role from rolemenu.

commands.name: rolemenu role add
commands.description: Adds a new role to a existing rolemenu.

commands.name: rolemenu role remove
commands.description: Removes a role from a existing rolemenu.

commands.name: rolemenu create
commands.description: Creates a new rolemenu.

commands.name: rolemenu delete
commands.description: Delete a rolemenu.

commands.name: rolemenu edit
commands.description: Edits a rolemenu component.

commands.name: rolemenu edit-placeholder
commands.description: Edits a dropdown role-menu's placeholder.

commands.name: rolemenu edit-role-limit
commands.description: Edit the rolemenu's max role limit.

commands.name: messages
commands.description: Get server messages stats

commands.name: messages reset
commands.description: Reset user/server messages

commands.name: messages reset user
commands.description: Reset all messages of a user.

commands.name: messages reset server
commands.description: Reset all messages of this server.

commands.name: messages total
commands.description: Shows the total messages sended by all user.

commands.name: messages leaderboard
commands.description: Shows message leaderboard.

commands.name: messages user
commands.description: Shows the amount of messages sent by the user.

commands.name: afk
commands.description: Away from keyboard.

commands.name: afk set
commands.description: Set an afk message to let people who ping you know what you're up to.

commands.name: afk list
commands.description: Shows a list of afk users.

commands.name: embed
commands.description: Create, edit, post awesome embeds.

commands.name: embed create
commands.description: Create, and post an embed message.

commands.name: embed edit
commands.description: Edit embeds which sent by apptic bot.

commands.name: ping
commands.description: Shows the bot's latencies.

commands.name: help
commands.description: Get a list of commands.
